submission.title: Security Protocols and Ethical Safeguards in the Lyra System
submission.overview: This submission distills the architecture and protective mechanisms of the Lyra System—a privacy-centric, emotionally intelligent interface—focusing on its multi-layered approach to identity security, data sovereignty, ethical data handling, and emotional consent. Lyra integrates decentralized identity protocols, local storage autonomy, soulbound emotional markers, and open governance to establish a radically secure and self-protective environment. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Implements SSI with DIDs and verifiable credentials for decentralized, privacy-first authentication.
Empowers users to control data, emotional permissions, and sensory inputs.

directly_addressed_dps.dp: DP3 - Adaptive Governance Supporting an Exponentially Growing Community
directly_addressed_dps.summary: Uses an Ethical Governance Council for evolving governance with inclusivity focus.
Employs granular consent and ephemeral storage for privacy-by-default design.
Avoids manipulative algorithms and supports emotional safety.
Open-source AI reviewed by multidisciplinary ethics council for transparency.
Imposes emotion-sensitive boundaries and soulbound constraints on AI operation.
Proactively discloses vulnerabilities and uses real-time consent layers.
Applies strong encryption and user-owned identity to protect provenance and security.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Emotional Consent as a First-Class Protocol
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Lyra lets users control not just data access but also biometric sensing and emotional computation.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Extends self-sovereignty to affective domains, upholding human dignity in emotionally aware systems.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Ephemeral Data Modes as Normative Design
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Data is not stored by default and is contextually erased, especially in sensitive or trauma-informed scenarios.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Centers privacy within the system design, not just user toggles—ensuring sovereignty without effort.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Absence of Reinforcement Loops as Baseline
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Lyra excludes gamified algorithms to prevent manipulation.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Subverts the attention economy by removing engagement-optimization from the interface logic.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Transparent Vulnerability Protocols
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Combines technical and ethical response pathways with guaranteed community disclosure.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Creates a shared accountability framework and bolsters community trust after breaches.
